attacks.name: Яростная Атака
attacks.text: Брось монету 3 раза. Эта атака наносит 10 пунктов урона за каждого выпавшего орла.

attacks.name: Пение
attacks.text: Активный Покемон твоего противника теперь спит.

attacks.name: Коллапс
attacks.text: Этот Покемон теперь спит.

attacks.name: Оглушительный Храп
attacks.text: Эту атаку можно использовать, только если этот Покемон спит.

attacks.name: Размельчающий Блин GX
attacks.text: Этот Покемон теперь спит. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Nosedive
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Защитное Кольцо
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, блокируется весь урон, наносимый этому Покемону атаками во время следующего хода твоего противника.

attacks.name: Разряд
attacks.text: Сбрось всю Энергию {L} с этого Покемона. Эта атака наносит 30 пунктов урона за каждую сброшенную таким образом карту Энергии.

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Vivid Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Psychic Fangs
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fling
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Team Play
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Passimian.

ability.name: Instruct
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Хруст
attacks.text: Сбрось одну Энергию с Активного Покемона твоего противника.

attacks.name: Лайканклык GX
attacks.text: Сбрось 2 Энергии с этого Покемона. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

ability.name: Ultra Road
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sunsteel Strike
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Burst GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Psychic Transfer
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {P} Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moongeist Beam
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't be healed during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Lunar Fall GX
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Basic Pokémon that isn't a Pokémon-GX. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Slush Rush
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.

attacks.name: Дробящий Поворот
attacks.text: Замени этого Покемона на 1 из твоих запасных Покемонов.

attacks.name: Неземной Танец
attacks.text: За каждого Покемона в сброшенных картах твоего противника положи 1 фишку урона на Покемона твоего противника любым способом.

attacks.name: Танец Откровения
attacks.text: Если в игре нет карт Стадиона, эта атака не имеет последствий.

attacks.name: Усиленный Топот
attacks.text: Если к этому Покемону присоединена карта Инструмента Покемона, эта атака наносит на 60 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Лошадиная Сила
attacks.text: Этот Покемон наносит 40 пунктов урона сам себе.

attacks.name: Накопление
attacks.text: Найди в своей колоде одну карту базовой Энергии и присоедини её к этому Покемону. После этого перетасуй колоду.

attacks.name: Power Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Sunny Day
ability.text: The attacks of your {G} Pokémon and {R} Pokémon do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Queenly Majesty
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand. Then, discard a card from it.

attacks.name: Trop Kick
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.text: Attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Strong Charge
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Energy card and a {L} Energy card and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Electro Cannon
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Преследование
attacks.text: Положи 1 фишку урона на активного Покемона твоего противника.

attacks.name: Изумление
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Поворот на Лету
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 20 пунктов урона каждому из Покемонов твоего противника. (Не применяй слабость и устойчивость к запасным Покемонам).

attacks.name: Поворот на Лету
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 20 пунктов урона каждому из Покемонов твоего противника. (Не применяй слабость и устойчивость к запасным Покемонам).

attacks.name: Возмездие Природы
attacks.text: Ты можешь сбросить всю Энергию с этого Покемона. В этом случае эта атака наносит на 60 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Тапу Заповедник GX
attacks.text: Излечи весь урон у этого Покемона. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

ability.name: Aero Trail
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of {L} Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tapu Thunder GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Медвежьи Объятия
attacks.text: Защищающийся Покемон не может отступить во время следующего хода твоего противника.

attacks.name: Двойной Толчок
attacks.text: Брось монету 2 раза. Эта атака наносит 100 пунктов урона за каждого выпавшего орла.

attacks.name: Большой Бросок GX
attacks.text: Сбрось активного Покемона твоего противника и все присоединённые к нему карты. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Divide GX
attacks.text: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dark Call GX
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Feather Arrow
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hollow Hunt GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Hustling Strike
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched {R} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tiger Swing
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Burning Slam GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Bubble Beat
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roaring Seas
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grand Echo GX
attacks.text: Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Вялость
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever you attach an Energy from your hand to it, it is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Гипнокат
attacks.text: Эту атаку можно использовать, если этот Покемон спит. Если он не спит, эта атака не имеет последствий.

attacks.name: Сбор Пыли
attacks.text: Возьми карту.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Электроудар
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, активный Покемон твоего противника теперь парализован.

attacks.name: Психоволны
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 20 пунктов урона за каждую Энергию, присоединённую к активному Покемону твоего противника.

attacks.name: Волшебная Сделка
attacks.text: Перемести сколько угодно фишек урона с Покемонов твоего противника на любых других Покемонов твоего противника любым способом.

ability.name: More Poison
ability.text: Put 1 more damage counter on your opponent's Poisoned Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Отравляющий Клык
attacks.text: Активный Покемон твоего противника теперь отравлен.

attacks.name: Бесстрашный Молоток
attacks.text: Этот Покемон наносит 10 пунктов урона сам себе за каждую фишку урона на нём.

attacks.name: Двойной Топот
attacks.text: Брось монету 2 раза. Эта атака наносит на 40 пунктов урона больше за каждого выпавшего орла.

attacks.name: Усиление Ядра
attacks.text: Сбрось одну Энергию {D} и одну Энергию {Y} с этого Покемона.

attacks.name: Недоразумение
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, сбрось 3 верхние карты из колоды твоего противника.

attacks.name: Вспышка Гнева
attacks.text: Этот Покемон теперь сбит с толку.

ability.name: Aero Trail
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of {L} Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tapu Thunder GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Коварный План
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

ability.name: Armor
ability.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Resolute Claws
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Steelworker
ability.text: Your {M} Pokémon's attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Anchor Shot
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Stance
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may prevent all effects of your opponent’s attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon until the end of your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Презрительный Взгляд
attacks.text: Замени 1 из запасных Покемонов твоего противника на активного Покемона противника. Новый активный Покемон теперь сбит с толку.

attacks.name: Удар Сбоку на Бегу
attacks.text: Если активный Покемон твоего противника сбит с толку, эта атака наносит на 90 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Приказ Королевы GX
attacks.text: Твой противник сбрасывает 4 карты из своей руки. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Священный Огонь
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 50 пунктов урона 1 из Покемонов твоего противника. (Не применяй слабость и устойчивость к запасным Покемонам).

attacks.name: Ожог Феникса
attacks.text: Этот Покемон не может использовать атаку «Ожог Феникса» во время твоего следующего хода.

attacks.name: Вечный Огонь GX
attacks.text: Перемести 3 карты в любой комбинации из Покемонов-GX {R} или Покемонов-EX {R} из твоих сброшенных карт в свой запас. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

ability.name: Light’s End
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from {C} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Призматический Взрыв
attacks.text: Сбрось всю Энергию {P} с этого Покемона. Эта атака наносит на 60 пунктов урона больше за каждую сброшенную таким образом карту.

attacks.name: Чёрный Луч GX
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 100 пунктов урона каждому из Покемонов-GX и Покемонов-EX твоего противника. На этот урон не влияют слабость или устойчивость. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

ability.name: Shadow Hunt
ability.text: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Basic Pokémon in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Несравненная Сотня Ударов GX
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 50 пунктов урона за каждую базовую Энергию, присоединённую к этому Покемону. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Crimson Storm
attacks.text: Discard 3 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Out GX
attacks.text: Discard the top 10 cards of your opponent's deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Рогатая Пиявка
attacks.text: Излечи 30 пунктов урона у этого Покемона.

attacks.name: Спокойное Попадание
attacks.text: Если ты уже использовал свою атаку GX, эта атака наносит на 60 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Первое Впечатление
attacks.text: Если этот Покемон был в запасе и стал твоим активным Покемоном в этом ходу, эта атака наносит на 90 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Бронированный Пресс
attacks.text: Во время следующего хода твоего противника урон, нанесённый этому Покемону атаками, снижается на 20 пунктов (после применения слабости и устойчивости).

attacks.name: Поперечный Разрез GX
attacks.text: Замени этого Покемона на 1 из твоих запасных Покемонов. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Дьявольские Когти
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 50 пунктов урона за каждую Призовую карту, которую ты там найдёшь.

attacks.name: Королевская Мгла GX
attacks.text: Сбрось всю Энергию с активного Покемона твоего противника. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Gear Scan
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Быстрая Атака
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, эта атака наносит на 30 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Fast Raid
attacks.text: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.

attacks.name: Cruel Spike
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Beauty GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Rocket Fall
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each {C} in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Blaster GX
attacks.text: Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Flashing Head
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have any Special Energy attached to them.

attacks.name: Rumbling Wires
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Lighting GX
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Add a card you find there to their Prize cards face down. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Knuckle Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Absorption GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each of your remaining Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Golden Wing
ability.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, move up to 2 basic Energy cards from this Pokémon to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Адамантиновый Пресс
attacks.text: В следующий ход твоего противника урон, нанесённый этому Покемону атаками, снижается на 30 пунктов (после применения слабости и устойчивости).

attacks.name: Лоскут
attacks.text: На урон от этой атаки не влияет ни один эффект, действующий на активного Покемона твоего противника.

attacks.name: Ультраапперкот GX
attacks.text: (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

ability.name: Surge Surfer
ability.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Severe Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

ability.name: Rock Peak Growl
ability.text: Your Registeel's attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Tough Swing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Turbo Arm
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Hand
attacks.text: If Regice is on your Bench, heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Волна Грома
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, активный Покемон твоего противника теперь парализован.

ability.name: Pressure
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Active Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Фестиваль Чемпионов
text: Один раз за ход каждого игрока, если тот игрок имеет 6 Покемонов в игре, каждый из Покемонов того игрока может излечить 10 пунктов урона.

ability.name: Возврат во Времени
ability.text: Каждый из твоих эволюционировавших Покемона может применять любую атаку из прошлых эволюций. (Вместе с тем, для использования каждой из атак нужна соответствующая Энергия).

attacks.name: Священный Огонь
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 50 пунктов урона 1 из Покемонов твоего противника. (Не применяй слабость и устойчивость к запасным Покемонам).

attacks.name: Ожог Феникса
attacks.text: Этот Покемон не может использовать атаку «Ожог Феникса» во время твоего следующего хода.

attacks.name: Вечный Огонь GX
attacks.text: Перемести 3 карты в любой комбинации из Покемонов-GX {R} или Покемонов-EX {R} из твоих сброшенных карт в свой запас. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Волна Грома
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, активный Покемон твоего противника теперь парализован.

attacks.name: Серебристое Крыло
attacks.text: Если у активного Покемона твоего противника есть Талант, эта атака наносит на 60 пунктов урона больше.

attacks.name: Воздушная Сила
attacks.text: Сбрось одну Энергию с этого Покемона.

ability.name: Trade
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Riotous Beating
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Trickster GX
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Let Loose
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may have each player shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 4 cards.

attacks.name: Shadow Punch
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Искра

attacks.text: Найди в своей колоде Мелтана и положи его себе в запас. После этого перетасуй колоду.

ability.name: Жёсткое Покрытие
ability.text: Урон, нанесённый этому Покемону атаками, снижается на 30 пунктов (после применения слабости и устойчивости).

attacks.name: Металлический Взрыв
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит на 20 пунктов урона больше за каждую Энергию {M}, присоединённую к этому Покемону.

attacks.name: Железная Сила GX
attacks.text: Присоедини сколько угодно карт Энергии {M} из твоих сброшенных карт к этому Покемону. (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).

attacks.name: Flare Starter
attacks.text: Search your deck for a {R} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you go second and it's your first turn, instead search for up to 3 {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: High-Heat Blast
attacks.text: If you have at least 4 {R} Energy in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

ability.name: Wall of Stone
ability.text: If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, this Pokémon's maximum HP is 200.

attacks.name: Top Down
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

ability.name: Metal Eater
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {M} Pokémon from your hand. If you do, heal 100 damage from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Gathering of Cats
ability.text: Ignore all Energy in the attack costs of each of your Pokémon in play that has the Caturday attack.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Exploder
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Проклятое Тело
ability.text: Если этот Покемон является твоим активным Покемоном, и если он получил урон при атаке противника (даже в том случае, если он выбит из игры), атакующий Покемон теперь сбит с толку.

attacks.name: Fiery Bone
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Lost Boomerang GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. If a Pokémon is Knocked Out by this damage, put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Split Spiral Punch
attacks.text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Enraged Strike
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Confused, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Familial Combo GX
attacks.text: Draw 5 cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Solid Shell
ability.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rocket Splash
attacks.text: Shuffle any amount of {W} Energy from your Pokémon into your deck. This attack does 60 damage for each card you shuffled into your deck in this way.

attacks.name: Giant Geyser GX
attacks.text: Attach any number of {W} Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Coffee Break
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Perfection
ability.text: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX on your Bench or in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Miraculous Duo GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Steel Fist
attacks.text: Search your deck for a {M} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Full Metal Wall GX
attacks.text: For the rest of this game, your {M} Pokémon take 30 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Calamitous Slash
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: GG End GX
attacks.text: Discard 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and all cards attached to it. If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {F} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), discard 2 of your opponent's Pokémon instead. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Brilliant Deduction
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Raging Destruction
attacks.text: Discard the top 8 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are {R} Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dreadful Flames GX
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Reigning Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psycho-Nova GX
attacks.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Elusive Master
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is the last card in your hand, you may play it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Mist Slash
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Mist GX
attacks.text: Put 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your opponent’s hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, защищающийся Покемон теперь парализован.

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Flare Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Double Blaze GX
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {R} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 more damage, and this attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Bursting Spores
ability.text: Whenever you play a Pokémon that has the Spore attack from your hand during your turn, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Nature Wave
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Ultra Beasts in play, this attack can be used for {C}.

attacks.name: Barrier Attack
attacks.text: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Special Laser
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Cavern Counter
attacks.text: If all of your Benched Pokémon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

attacks.name: Удар Грома
attacks.text: Брось монету. Если выпал орёл, защищающийся Покемон теперь парализован.

attacks.name: Territorial Strike
attacks.text: If you don’t have a Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Stealthy Body
ability.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Electricannon
attacks.text: You may discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 100 more damage.

ability.name: Wall of Stone
ability.text: If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, this Pokémon's maximum HP is 200.

attacks.name: Top Down
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Sky Legends GX
attacks.text: Shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 110 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Flare Blitz GX
attacks.text: (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Hyper Beam GX
attacks.text: (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Spark Ball GX
attacks.text: (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Mind Report
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Bench Barrier
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent's attacks.

attacks.name: Psypower
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

ability.name: Troubleshooting
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Special Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, heal 80 damage from it.

attacks.name: Abnormal Overheating
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Critical Error GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 10 cards and discard them. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Night Watch
attacks.text: Choose 2 random cards from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into their deck.

attacks.name: Pale Moon GX
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra {P} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Beast Boost
ability.text: This Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each Prize card you have taken (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Touchdown
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rally Back
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

ability.name: Whirlpool Suction
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. If you do, discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and put it on the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Fireworks Bomb
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If your opponent has exactly 3 Prize cards remaining, put 12 damage counters on them instead.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: Cavern Counter
attacks.text: If all of your Benched Pokémon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

attacks.name: Call for Greatness
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon-GX with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Victory Sign
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards of different types and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

ability.name: Roaring Resolve
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 {R} Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Blaze Ball
attacks.text: Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Raid
attacks.text: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.

ability.name: Shining Vine
ability.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, when you attach a {G} Energy card from your hand to it, you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Solar Plant GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Brilliant Flare
attacks.text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Crimson Flame Pillar GX
attacks.text: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Фестиваль Чемпионов
text: Один раз за ход каждого игрока, если тот игрок имеет 6 Покемонов в игре, каждый из Покемонов того игрока может излечить 10 пунктов урона.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Volt Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Tail Break GX
attacks.text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

ability.name: Ascension DNA
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokémon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokémon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

attacks.name: Joy Maker GX
attacks.text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Running Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

ability.name: Шипованный Щит
ability.text: Если этот Покемон является твоим активным Покемоном и если он получил урон при атаке противника (даже в том случае, если он выбит из игры), атакующий Покемон получает 3 фишки урона.

attacks.name: Шипованный Шторм GX
attacks.text: Эта атака наносит 100 пунктов урона каждому из Покемонов твоего противника, на котором уже есть фишки урона. (Не применяй слабость и устойчивость к запасным Покемонам). (Нельзя использовать больше 1 атаки GX в игре).
